content:
DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle Enum

Definition

Specifies the border styles that can be applied to the cells of a DataGridView control.

In this Article

public enum DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle

Remarks

The AdvancedCellBorderStyle property of the DataGridView control returns an object of type DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle, which has properties of type DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle.

Fields

Inset

A single-line sunken border.
InsetDouble

A double-line sunken border.
None

No borders.
NotSet

The border is not set.
Outset

A single-line raised border.
OutsetDouble

A double-line raised border.
OutsetPartial

A single-line border containing a raised portion.
Single

A single-line border.
